custom_settings.name: data_eng_principals
custom_settings.description: Groups with Service Account Token creator role on service accounts in IAM format, eg 'group:group@domain.com'.

custom_settings.name: network_config
custom_settings.description: Shared VPC network configurations to use. If null networks will be created in projects with preconfigured values.

custom_settings.name: prefix
custom_settings.description: Unique prefix used for resource names. Not used for project if 'project_create' is null.

custom_settings.name: project_create
custom_settings.description: Provide values if project creation is needed, uses existing project if null. Parent is in 'folders/nnn' or 'organizations/nnn' format.

custom_settings.name: project_id
custom_settings.description: Project id, references existing project if `project_create` is null.

custom_settings.name: region
custom_settings.description: The region where resources will be deployed.

custom_settings.name: service_encryption_keys
custom_settings.description: Cloud KMS keys to use to encrypt resources. Provide a key for each reagion configured.
